alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bennington and western Windham Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Tabor to 6 miles south of Chester. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Londonderry, Townshend, Manchester, Stratton, Dorset, Newfane, Manchester Center, West Wardsboro, Windham, Jamaica, Wardsboro, Grafton, Peru, Wardsboro Center, Goose City, South Windham, Williamsville, Barnumville, East Dover and East Jamaica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
